page.title: 19DOCTOR
page.content: The Surgery,situated at the bottom of Whitworth road in Darley Dale,was converted from an old house.The surgery being moved because of its small size.In the surgery there are five people including Dr.Martys.This group of people consists of three doctors and two secretarys.Dr.Martys ,who was the doctor we interviewed,has now been working there for fifteen years.He finds it a hard working job,starting at eight a.m. and finishing at six p.m..He mainly treats elderly people, who suffer,mostly,from rumatism and diebetes."The patients themselves can prevent these by more exercise,eating less fatty foods and having less sugar in their meals,"He says. Some diseases are spread by human contact so cleanliness in the area is all important.
